predicate.note: Frames file for 'dabble' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: yabba dabble do
example.text: An undistinguished college student who *trace* dabbled in zoology until he concluded that he couldn't stand cutting up frogs, Mr. Corry wanted to work for a big company ``that could do big things.''
example.arg: until he concluded that he couldn't stand cutting up frogs
